text: Caramilk is a brand of chocolate bar. There are two different chocolate bars with the name Caramilk. The bar in Canada is made of milk chocolate with caramel filling and the bar in Australia is white chocolate that has been caramelized. Caramilk is owned by Cadbury. The chocolate bar was created at the Cadbury factory in Montreal in 1968. It later moved to the Gladstone factory in Toronto in 1978. It began being sold in 1968. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1968 establishments in Canada Category:Canadian food Category:Chocolate bars
title: Caramilk
